thread.title: DeMarcus Cousins gets T'd up 32 seconds into game
thread.title_full: DeMarcus Cousins gets T'd up 32 seconds into game

title: DeMarcus Cousins gets T'd up 32 seconds into game
text:
DeMarcus Cousins gets T'd up 32 seconds into game At record speed! Post to Facebook DeMarcus Cousins gets T'd up 32 seconds into game At record speed!  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/demarcus-cousins-technical-foul-new-orleans-pelicans-18-nba-season   DeMarcus Cousins gets T'd up 32 seconds into game Andrew Joseph 8:13 p.m. ET Feb. 26, 2017 
DeMarcus Cousins was sitting at 17 technical fouls for the season when Sacramento traded the star center to the New Orleans Pelicans. That 18th technical would mean a one-game suspension, and it didn't take Cousins very long to hit that mark. 
In his third game with New Orleans, Cousins was hit with a technical foul after getting tangled up with the Thunder's Steven Adams 32 seconds into Sunday's game. Took 32 seconds for Boogie to receive another technical foul. He will be suspended a game unless this is rescinded. pic.twitter.com/4rbcYHRfE1 â€” Bleacher Report (@BleacherReport) February 27, 2017 
The league will review the call, and if the technical stands, Cousins will miss New Orleans' game against the Pistons on Wednesday. 
According to Elias Sports Bureau , 32 seconds into a game was the quickest technical foul of Cousins' career. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/demarcus-cousins-technical-foul-new-orleans-pelicans-18-nba-season Most Popular
